cast.name: 亚历山大·戈洛博罗德科 Aleksandr Goloborodko
亚历山大.帕舒金 Aleksandr Pashutin
维多利亚·费舍尔 Viktoriya Fisher

writer.name: 谢尔盖·戈卢别夫 Sergey Golubev

introduction: Moscow surgeon Maksim Kuzovlev comes to a remote fishing village after being transferred to a new hospital. At the same time, handsome former soldier Petr Grabov returns home and moves to the same village to work as a fisherman. On Maxim's first day, Anya, a young and attractive nurse, catches his attention, and he falls in love with her instantly. While Anya is fond of Maxim, she begins to question her own feelings after meeting Petr one night at the hospital. Forced to choose between two very different men and resolve this ill-fated love triangle once and for all, Anya has a difficult decision to make, and it is one which will inevitably change their lives forever.
